TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: The ManagementName attribute is used to override names exposed through a WMI class. Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The user-friendly name for the object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the user-friendly name for an object. The object can be a method parameter or properties marked with the ManagementProbe, ManagementKey, or ManagementConfiguration attributes.
Docs.value: Um valor que indica o nome de usuário amigável para um objeto.
